title: The Secret Art of Pivoting As You Pursue Your Purpose
description:
Have you ever looked up to someone who has built their dream career and assumed it was a straight shot from Point A to Point B? Ever wondered what the journey to creating and cultivating your dream career really looks like from the inside? More often than not, it's a very non-linear journey as one learns what works, what doesn't, what they like, and what they don't like so much. In this episode, Jordan shares a candid conversation (originally aired on the Heart and Hustle Podcast) with some of her business besties, Evie Rupp and Lindsey Roman, to discuss the very real journey that a gal can take as she pursues her purpose in life.

Tune in to learn:

1) How to Know When It's Time to Pivot in Your Career

2) The Art of Pivoting Well When It's Time

3) How to Get Past Limiting Beliefs And Other People's Expectations for You

4) Healthier Ways to Think About Making Money as You Build Your Dreams

And more!

Follow Lindsey and Evie here:

@mrslindseyroman

@evierupp
author: matt@jordanleedooley.com (Jordan Lee Dooley)
